data.description: Examines the history and philosophy of higher and postsecondary education; the major participants; curriculum; governance and leadership; relations with state and federal government; and current issues.
data.title: INTRODUCTION TO HIGHER AND POST-SECONDARY EDUCATION

data.description: Examines the origins, contemporary landscape, structures, and stakeholders of minority-serving institutions (MSIs) -- historically black colleges and universities (HBCUs), Hispanic-serving institutions (HSIs), and tribal colleges and universities (TCUs) -- including related challenges and opportunities for research and practice.
data.title: MINORITY-SERVING INSTITUTIONS OF HIGHER EDUCATION
